com.persistit.mxbeans

Interface AlertMonitorMXBean

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AlertMonitor

    @MXBean
public interface AlertMonitorMXBean
    Management interface to the AlertMonitor which accumulates and logs abnormal events such as IOExceptions and measurements outside of expected thresholds.

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getAlertLevel

        String getAlertLevel()
        Current maximum AlertLevel in this monitor as a String: one of NORMAL, WARN or ERROR

      • reset

        void reset()
        Restore this alert monitor to its initial state at level AlertMonitor.AlertLevel.NORMAL with no history.

      • getWarnLogTimeInterval

        long getWarnLogTimeInterval()
        Returns:
        the interval in milliseconds between successive notifications for this monitor when its level is AlertMonitor.AlertLevel.WARN.

      • setWarnLogTimeInterval

        void setWarnLogTimeInterval(long warnLogTimeInterval)
        Set the interval between successive notifications for this monitor when its AlertMonitor.AlertLevel.WARN.
        Parameters:
        warnLogTimeInterval - the interval in milliseconds

      • getErrorLogTimeInterval

        long getErrorLogTimeInterval()
        Returns:
        the interval in milliseconds between successive notifications for this monitor when its AlertMonitor.AlertLevel.ERROR.

      • setErrorLogTimeInterval

        void setErrorLogTimeInterval(long errorLogTimeInterval)
        Set the interval between successive notifications for this monitor when its AlertMonitor.AlertLevel.ERROR.
        Parameters:
        errorLogTimeInterval - the interval in milliseconds

      • getHistoryLength

        int getHistoryLength()
        Returns:
        The number of events per category for which to keep individual Events.

      • setHistoryLength

        void setHistoryLength(int historyLength)
        Set the number of events per category on which to keep a complete history. Once the number of events exceeds this count, the events aggregated.
        Parameters:
        historyLength - the historyLength to set

      • getSummary

        String getSummary()
        Return a summary of this AlertMonitor's current state.
        Returns:
        a summary report

      • getDetailedHistory

        String getDetailedHistory(String category)
        Return a detailed description, including first and recent occurrences of events within the History for the specified category. If there is no history for the specified category, this method returns null .
        Parameters:
        category - the category name
        Returns:
        the detailed report

      • poll

        void poll(boolean force)
        Called periodically to emit log messages
        Parameters:
        force - Whether to force notifications to be issued immediatel
